4.title: BillShare
4.description: Devised a mobile application where users can split bills with friends. Users can send/accept friend requests, create groups and share bills with multiple users at a time. App keeps track of due date specified for a bill, notifies individuals for any bills which are overdue.

3.title: FlashTrip
3.description: Developed a web application to prepare itinerary for selected tourist destination and duration using Google Maps APIs. Authored an algorithm to optimize the travel time and distance between the places in the proposed itinerary.

1.title: Dynamic channel access scheme for IEEE 802.11ah protocol
1.description: Presented a comparative study of traditional DCF vs 802.11e EDCA based channel access scheme. Conceptualized a dynamic access scheme by predicting channel access parameter values using hierarchical clustering and regression tree machine learning algorithms.

2.title: Linux Shell
2.description: Implemented a shell program using basic Linux system calls in C such as fork and execvp. Shell supports I/O redirection, pipes, history, background process and globbing.
